awakenawakennomi.ability.ground_only: This ability can only be used while on the ground.
awakenawakennomi.ability.awaken_suke_pun: Punch a block to toggle its invisibility; displays particles and plays a sound.
awakenawakennomi.ability.awaken_suke_inv: Create a spherical zone that progressively hides blocks; charging increases radius and can be kept active.
